thread.title: Bradley Crum
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Bradley Crum

author: Bradley Crum
title: Bradley Crum
text: My wife and I had a good experience buying a new sectional at American Freight. Sales people were helpful and when purchasing, we had help getting the pieces loaded into our truck. Couch is home and we love it. Thanks.
